INSTALL.TITLE: Basic System Installation
INSTALL.DESCRIPTION: Welcome to BHIMA!  To get started, please enter your enterprise name and a user to serve as system administrator.
INSTALL.SUCCESS_INSTALL: Success!  You are now ready to use BHIMA
INSTALL.NO_INSTALLATION: It looks like you are running BHIMA for the first time.  Please click "install" below to begin setting up your BHIMA installation.
